snippet: A slowdown in international trade could be a harbinger of a new recession for the world’s leading economies, the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development said.
abstract: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development says slowdown in international trade could be indication of new recession for world's biggest economies.
lead_paragraph: A slowdown in international trade could be a harbinger of a new recession for the world’s leading economies, the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development said.

headline.main: World Economies Could Face Recession, O.E.C.D. Says
headline.print_headline: World Economies Could Face Recession, O.E.C.D. Says

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development
